mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, content = #{content}, update_date = #{updateDate}, anthology_id = #{anthologyId}, additional_info_id = #{additionalInfoId}, cover_image_id = #{coverImageId} WHERE _id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT article._id AS _id, article.title AS title, article.summary AS summary, author._id AS author_id, authentication.nick_name AS author_nick_name, author.icon_image_id AS author_icon_image_id, article.publish_date AS publish_date, anthology._id AS anthology_id, anthology.title AS anthology_title, article.additional_info_id AS additional_info_id, article.cover_image_id AS cover_image_id FROM article article INNER JOIN anthology anthology ON article.anthology_id = anthology._id INNER JOIN author author ON author._id = anthology.author_id INNER JOIN authentication_author authenticationAndAuthor ON author._id = authenticationAndAuthor.author_id INNER JOIN authentication authentication ON authenticationAndAuthor.authentication_id = authentication._id WHERE anthology._id = #{id}
